attributes.action: have a serious word with all middle lane drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: no longer enjoy your motorway experience, could it be Harold & Betty cruising along at 45 mph stuck in the middle lane with a I pay my road tax and I'll drive where I like attitude or the lorry passing the other lorry where the difference in speed can only be measured by time lapse photography.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
